hideDefaultBorder.name: Hide Default Foundry Border
hideDefaultBorder.hint: Remove Foundry’s built-in selection border on tokens.

enableTarget.name: Enable Target Border
enableTarget.hint: Also show the outline and glow on tokens you target.

disableOutline.name: Disable Outline Filter
disableOutline.hint: Turn this on to completely disable the outline filter.

disableGlow.name: Disable Glow Filter
disableGlow.hint: Turn this on to completely disable the glow filter.

thickness.name: Outline Thickness
thickness.hint: Width of the outline in pixels.

glowDistance.name: Glow Distance
glowDistance.hint: Glow radius in pixels. Larger values expand the glow outward.

glowOuterStrength.name: Glow Strength
glowOuterStrength.hint: Intensity of the outer glow. Higher values are brighter.

mode.name: Color Mode
mode.hint: Use Foundry disposition colors, custom colors, or colors based on health condition.

outlineColor.name: Outline Color
outlineColor.hint: Used only when Color Mode is Custom and Outline is enabled. Sets the outline color for selected tokens. Default: #88ccff

targetOutlineColor.name: Target Outline Color
targetOutlineColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom and Target Outline is enabled. Sets the outline color for targeted tokens. Default: #88ccff

glowColor.name: Glow Color
glowColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom and Glow is enabled. Sets the glow color for selected tokens. Default: #88ccff

targetGlowColor.name: Target Glow Color
targetGlowColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom and Target Glow is enabled. Sets the glow color for targeted tokens. Default: #88ccff
